text: Ke kaloku imfano yabo banikela ngobutyebi babo befuna ukukholisa uAllâh babe nabo ezintliziyweni zabo beqinisekile okokuba uAllâh Uza kubavuza, injengesitiya esisendulini, ekuthi kwakuna imvula enkulu kuso sivelise isivuno esiphindwe kabini. Zesithi xa singayifumenanga imvula enkulu, nencinane yanele kuso. UAllâh Ukubona (konke) oko nikwenzayo
